text: @replouiegohmert You're a clown! Masks are to be worn over your mouth and nose! This looks good on you since you've been denying masks from the start. Also, why hold a meeting with your staff to tell em you COVID19 positive, wouldn't an email have been more appropriate!?!? https://t.co/9EVqsWUmgn
